alert.note: Alert for Barton; Dade; Jasper (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 4:28AM CDT until April 05 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Barton County in southwestern Missouri... Northeastern Jasper County in southwestern Missouri... Dade County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 515 AM CDT. * At 427 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jasper, or 8 miles north of Carthage, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. Quarter size hail was reported in Oronogo. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carthage, Stockton Lake, Greenfield, Lockwood, Jasper, Golden City, Alba, Carytown, Brooklyn Heights, South Greenfield, Arcola, Cane Hill, Dudenville, Kenoma, Maple Grove, Neola, Cedarville, Meinert, Sylvania and Boston. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 41 and 61. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
